picks.description: Determines which themes are shown in the "Choose a theme" step during signup.

photography.name: Photography
photography.author: The Theme Foundry
photography.description: A WordPress theme built for photographers. Includes easy to use galleries,  and two gorgeous color schemes.
photography.description_long:
By The Theme Foundry

Built for photographers.

Showcase your work.

We believe managing your photography website should be easy, and that’s why we built the Photography theme. Upload and organize your photo shoots into galleries straight from your WordPress dashboard. Your galleries are then automatically displayed in a beautiful slideshow, making it easy for potential clients to browse your work. Next, create a gallery page and organize your individual galleries in a neat grid of thumbnails using the built in drag and drop interface. Stop worrying about cobbling together your photos and information across different sources, and start enjoying a streamlined website that unifies your work and your brand.

Expand your reach.

Blog included.

Start taking control of your online presence through the built-in blog. Post all different types of content — single photos, videos, and short updates. It’s a great way to keep your fans up to date and drive new traffic to your website. You have complete control over the display of the posts and can show or hide tags, categories, authors, dates, and featured images. The blog is clean and simple, making the focus your work and your words.

Blazing fast.

Speed matters.

We realize beautiful photos aren’t always optimized for the web and your readers might not be on a fast internet connection. That’s why we took extra steps to ensure your galleries load quickly and efficiently. Instead of trying to dump all the photos on the page at once, we cascade them in via a JSON data stream. This keeps page load times low, and gives your website that snappy and responsive feel.

Help and additional information

If you need help with Photography be sure to read through the Photography documentation by clicking the Support button at the top of the sidebar on this page. You can also ask us questions in the WordPress.com Photography support forum.

Note: This version of Photography differs from the self-hosted (WordPress.org) version. Most importantly, the WordPress.com version does not include Flickr integration.

Looking to buy Photography for a self hosted WordPress.org website? The Theme Foundry builds WordPress templates for WordPress.org and you can purchase the Photography theme for WordPress.org directly from their website.

Quick Specs (all measurements in pixels):

  1. Photography is a flexible-width, responsive design.
  2. The main column maximum width is 628 except in the full-width layout where it’s 960.
  3. The home page images are 948 by 534.
  4. Individual gallery images can be up to 960 wide.

luscious.name: Luscious
luscious.author: StudioPress
luscious.description: Luscious is super-clean, lip-smacking theme designed for bloggers and publishers who want to frame their work in professional fashion.
luscious.description_long:
This super-clean, lip-smacking theme was designed for bloggers and publishers who want to frame their work in professional… joy. Gorgeous color, six beautiful layout options, and drag-and-drop widgets make it easy for you to get going.

The Luscious theme has multiple layouts and menus, breadcrumbs, and archive control. You can even add a customized Header image or custom background.

Featured Images

The Luscious theme allows you to display a featured image which is placed above your post title which gives your blog an amazing and beautiful look.

Layouts

You can choose from 6 different layout configurations for Luscious. You can have your content on the left with a sidebar on the right, flip that around, have two sidebars or even remove the sidebar altogether.

Plenty of Options

Part of Luscious’ charm is the option for customizing the look of your site. This includes sidebar widget area, two menu areas, and control over what content is displayed in your blog archive pages.

Custom Header Image and Background

You can further customize Luscious thanks to the Custom Header and Background options found in Appearance → Header and Appearance → Background.

Quick Specs (all measurements in pixels):

  1. Content and One Sidebar: The main column width is 620 with one sidebar of 440 and an alternative sidebar of 150.
  2. Full-width layout: The main column is 880

Luscious theme documentation

flora-and-fauna.name: Flora and Fauna
flora-and-fauna.author: Automattic
flora-and-fauna.description: A playful personal blogging theme designed and illustrated by Aline Yamada
flora-and-fauna.description_long:
Featured Images

Want to highlight your content visually? Consider adding a Featured Image to your posts! Featured Images will appear above the content at the full column width and unlimited height on the blog index and archives pages.

Post Formats & Sticky Posts

Flora and Fauna supports the Aside, Image, Video, Quote, Link, Gallery, and Status Post Formats, allowing you to easily create a tumblelog of your favorite finds.

Aside, Quote, Link, Video, and Status

All post formats display with a unique background color for the date flag, and a link to the post format archive in the entry meta:

Image & Gallery

In addition to the above features, Image and Gallery post formats display with the entry content followed by the entry title, like so:

Sticky

Sticky posts are also highlighted with their own color and a graphic in place of the post date:

Theme Options

You can use the handy theme options to personalize Flora and Fauna by adding links to your favorite social networks, under Appearance → Customize → Theme Options.

Social network icons for Email, Facebook, Pinterest, and Twitter will appear at the top of the Sidebar if you enter their respective URLs in the fields provided:

Custom Menus

Configure a custom menu that will display in the header of your site by going to Appearance → Menus and assigning it to the Primary Menu area.

Widgets

Flora and Fauna supports up to four widget areas – one Sidebar and three optional Footer Sidebars – that can be configured under Appearance → Widgets.

Full-width Page Template

To give your content more room on select pages, you can remove the sidebar with the Full Width, No Sidebar template under Page Attributes.

Custom Header and Background

You can upload your own flexible-size custom header to Flora and Fauna under Appearance → Header. The header will display just above your site title. You can also add your own background image or color under Appearance → Backgrounds.

Quick Specs (all measurements in pixels)

  1. The main column width is 660 except in the full-width layout where it’s 960
  2. The Sidebar width is 250
  3. The Footer Sidebar widths are 660 each

massive-press.name: Massive Press
massive-press.author: Press75
massive-press.description: A clean, three-column, responsive grid-based magazine/news theme great for handling larger amounts of content. With a 100% widgetized home page template, Massive Press allows for great flexibility and content integration. Choose to show one, two, or no sidebars, leaving the content full width. With options to arrange the sidebar order, display images in a slider widget, and more, Massive Press allows for easy customization and unique page layouts.
massive-press.description_long:
Massive Press is a Magazine and News theme that includes a clean, grid-based layout. The entire home page is 100% customizable with custom WordPress widgets that allow you to configure your website just the way you like it. Customize your header (colors, logo, menus, etc.) in seconds, and choose your content layout options for posts and pages.

Your Home Page — However You Want It
The Massive Press theme includes a unique 3-column home page template that is powered entirely by WordPress widgets. This means that you can configure your home page however you want it by mixing any number of available content widgets. The home page on the Massive Press theme demo uses just 2 different featured content widgets that are also included with the theme.

Responsive Layout
Massive Press includes a responsive layout, which means that it will look and function perfectly on any screen — mobile to desktop.

Customization Options
The theme customizer can be used to customize almost every aspect of the Massive Press theme including the Colors, Fonts, Header, Background Image, Menus, Logo and Layout Options.

Theme Layout Options
The Massive Press theme includes 3 different layout options that allow you to change where your sidebars are located in relation to your main content. For instance, you can have 1 sidebar on either side of your main content, or 2 sidebars to one side (left or right) of your main content.

Quick Specs (all measurements in pixels):

  1. Massive Press is a flexible-width, responsive design.
  2. Images and videos will scale to fit the viewing screen.
  3. Sidebars have a width of 216px.
  4. The main content with no sidebars showing has a width of 936px.
  5. The main content with one sidebar showing has a width of 696px.
  6. The main content with two sidebars showing has a width of 456px.

react.name: React
react.author: The Theme Foundry
react.description: A simple and elegant WordPress theme for business. Features a customizable portfolio page and a responsive layout that looks great on mobile devices.
react.description_long:
By The Theme Foundry

Showcase your work.

It’s never been easier.

React makes it simple to show off your work to your clients, customers, and fans. Quickly create a new post and include images, videos, and text. Your portfolio posts will automatically be displayed on your projects page. Your customers can browse all of your best work in one convenient location.

Add some style.

Make it your own.

Personalizing your new website should be fun. We’ve leveraged the built-in WordPress customizer, so adding your own background image or color is easy. On top of that, we’ve included seven hand selected font options. We’ve also included two flexible footer areas — latest news and recent projects. Combine these fonts and footers with a custom background to match your brand and give your website a truly unique look.

Introduce your brand.

Your business front and center.

The home page introduces you and your work. First, drag and drop a featured image and it will show up at the top of the page. Next, add some text that introduces you or your business to your customers. It’s also important for potential clients to see your latest work and any news, and you can optionally include both of these section in the footer of the page.

Help and additional information

If you need help with React be sure to read through the documentation by clicking the Support button at the top of the sidebar on this page. You can also ask us questions in the WordPress.com React support forum.

Looking to buy React for a self hosted WordPress.org website? The Theme Foundry builds WordPress templates for WordPress.org and you can purchase the React theme for WordPress.org directly from their website.

Quick Specs (all measurements in pixels):

  1. React is a flexible-width design, and adjusts to your resolution
  2. The main column maximum width is 490 except in the full-width layout where it’s 610.
  3. Images used in the React live demo are courtesy of David Lanham.

blog-simple.name: Blog Simple
blog-simple.author: Automattic
blog-simple.description: As the name says, Blog Simple is a simple blog-centric theme designed by Mike Kus. Its unique and bold two-tone design sets your blog apart from the crowd. Not only can you choose a theme color from four suggested colors, but also pick any color from a color picker.
blog-simple.description_long:
As the name says, Blog Simple theme is a simple blog-centric theme. Its unique and bold two-tone design sets your blog apart from the crowd. Not only can you choose a theme color from four suggested colors, but you can also pick any color from a color-picker.


Theme Options

In addition to the aforementioned theme color, you can optionally add links to your profiles in Facebook, Twitter, and also your email address with nifty icons in the footer.

Featured Post

Blog Simple displays the latest sticky post as a featured post on the front page of your blog page. If you don’t have any sticky posts, it simply displays the latest post in your blog.

Widget Areas

Blog Simple offers four widget areas:

The Primary Sidebar displays search, archives, and meta widgets by default.

Do you feel the need to have lots of widgets? No problem! Blog Simple has three optional widget areas in the footer.

Responsive Design

Blog Simple is designed with responsive design in mind. It provides a tailored layout depending on the device you are using. This makes your blog look good not only on desktop browsers, but also on devices with smaller screens, such as the iPad and iPhone.

Feeling creative?

As you can see in the main menu, Blog Simple goes well with icons! It’s a neat idea to add icons to your custom menu in the sidebar. If you are familiar with CSS, Custom Menus, Custom Menu Widgets, and the Custom Design Upgrade, you can associate icons with your menu items. Pretty neat, hah?

Quick Specs (all measurements in pixels)

  1. The main column width is 590 except in the full-width layout where it’s 940
  2. Primary sidebar width is 300.
  3. Suggested header size is 1000 wide by 250 high.

Blog Simple theme documentation

camera.name: Camera
camera.author: Array
camera.description: Camera is an elegant, distraction-free canvas for showcasing your photography. Along with large, beautiful Featured Images, you can also create unique photo series in a full-width carousel, which accommodates your landscape and portrait photographs. Camera is perfect for travel blogs, food blogs and photo series.
camera.description_long:
Camera is an elegant, distraction-free canvas for showcasing photography. Along with large, beautiful featured images, you can create unique photo series in a full-width carousel to accommodate both landscape and portrait images. Camera is perfect for travel blogs, food blogs, and photo series.

Powered by Photography

Using image galleries, you can create mobile- and tablet-friendly photo carousels to showcase your travel blog, food blog, or any photography. Camera supports carousel galleries, mosaic tiled galleries, thumbnail galleries, and featured images. Use a creative combination of these galleries to tell your story.

Mobile and Tablet Ready

Camera was crafted for all screens, from desktop to mobile and every device in between. Images and video scale down gracefully, for a seamless mobile browsing experience.

Distraction-Free

Camera features a minimal design to reduce common distractions, allowing visitors focus on your photography. Responsive site navigation, social links, and widgets are available via a slide-out sidebar.

Quick Specs (all measurements in pixels):

  1. The main column width is 640.
  2. Featured and carousel images for posts and pages should be at least 1200 wide.
  3. The Site Logo will appear at a maximum width of 500.

picks.name: Staff Picks
picks.description: Determines which themes are shown in the "Choose a theme" step during signup.

isca.name: Isca
isca.author: Pro Theme Design
isca.description: An elegant magazine theme for WordPress, with a responsive design, and support for widgets, post thumbnails, custom headers and custom backgrounds.
isca.description_long:
Isca is a tumblelog theme for WordPress. It has been designed for people who create a variety of types of content. It is the perfect theme for creative people, and for visual businesses who want an elegant outlet for your work.

Your Design, Everywhere

Isca has been designed to look good on all devices – from desktop computers and laptops, through smartphones and tablets (Android and iOS). Isca looks elegant everywhere.

Sticky Posts

At the top of the homepage is a featured content space. This highlights your most recent post bringing attention to your most important content. Sticky posts can be used to highlight your most important posts. For instance a restaurant blog could highlight your new recipes, or a shop blog could bring attention to latest special offers.

Post Formats

As a tumblog theme Isca supports all of the WordPress custom post formats. Simply create your website content as normal and then pick the format most suitable for the post. For example if your blog post includes a video set it as the video post format and the video will be highlighted in your post.

Custom Sidebars

Isca uses a series of custom sidebars to allow you to keep things nice and flexible.

  • Sidebar Widgets – a right hand sidebar. If there are no widgets to display then the sidebar will be hidden and the content will stretch to full width. This sidebar only displays on individual posts and pages. It will not display on the homepage or archive pages.
  • Footer Widgets – widgets to display in the footer of the site. These widgets will hide if they are left empty. This widget will display on all pages.

Custom Templates

Isca includes some custom page templates. These give you some additional functionality that you wouldn’t get with a normal theme.

  • Archives – A chronological list of all posts published on your blog.
  • Full Width Page – A normal WordPress page, only it has the sidebars removed so that you can have content that stretches the full width of the site.

Quick Specs (all measurements in pixels):

  1. At full width the main column width is 676 except in the full-width layout where it’s 946.
  2. The sidebar width is 230.
  3. Please keep in mind that this theme is responsive, which means that it changes size as the browser is resized.
  4. The post thumbnails (on the homepage) are 180 pixels wide by 120 pixels high.
  5. All featured Images are generated from the same initial image so make sure to keep the focus of the image in the center as the surrounding content may be cropped.

kiore-moana.name: Kiore Moana
kiore-moana.author: Elmastudio
kiore-moana.description: Kiore Moana is an easy-to-use one-column, responsive blog theme with big thumbnails, bold and beautiful typography, post format support and a minimal, widgetized info page option. The theme design embraces readability and offers lots of white space. Kiore Moana is a great theme for personal blogs, travel or photography blogs.
kiore-moana.description_long:
Kiore Moana is a beautiful, single-column responsive blogging theme. It’s well-suited for many types of blogs, including travel, hobby, photography, and personal. The theme has a very modern, open design with lots of white space, large, easy-to-read typography on all devices, and an extra page template for widgets.

Info Page with Beautiful Widgets

Kiore Moana is designed to display your posts without the distraction of a sidebar. However, if you want to include widgets on your site, you can use the special info page template. This template will arrange your widgets in a beautiful, one-column layout.

Info and Home Buttons

With the two minimal “Info” and “Home” buttons your visitors can always switch between your info page and blog content very easily and read your articles without any additional sidebar information taking away the focus from the content.

To set up your info page link, create a new page and assign it to the “info page” page template. Then, navigate to: Appearance →  Customize → Theme Options and enter the URL of the page you just created. Hit save, and you’ll see the link to your info page in the top right corner of your site.

Kiore Moana also comes with several custom widgets that let you share additional information about yourself: About Me, Social Links, and Featured Video.

Fun and Easy-to-Use Theme Features

With the Kiore Moana theme, your blog posts can really shine and become the center of attention on your blog. With the help of large featured images, a modern header slogan, support for all post formats, and beautiful typography styling options like side notes and drop caps, you can really make each blog post very special and interesting to read.

Header Slogan Widget

Kiore Moana comes with a custom widget (“Header Slogan”) that makes it easy to display a title and introduction to your blog on the front page. Just navigate to Appearance → Widgets and find the Header Slogan widget. Drop it into the associated Header Slogan widget area, and fill in the options to your liking.

Post Format Icons

The trendy, minimal icons used for the Kiore Moana post formats offer an extra highlight to each blog post.

A Great Blog Design for Mobile Devices

Kiore Moanas single column, minimal and bold blog design works great on all kinds of devices, so your content will be easy to read and look beautiful on smartphones, tablets, laptops, and large desktops.

Make It Your Own Style

From the Customizer, you can easily make Kiore Moana your own. Set up your info page, change the blog title and background color, change your header and background image and a custom menu to display in the footer.

Of course you can also customize your blog title and include your own blog title image under Appearance → Header and customize your main theme background under Appearance → Background.

Quick Specs (all measurements in pixels):

  1. The standard content width for Posts and Pages is 960.
  2. Image, Video, and Gallery Posts have a wider content width of 1160.
  3. Featured images should have a minimum width of 960, and a max width of 1900.
  4. The custom header image should be 115 x115 in width and height.

alto.name: Alto
alto.author: Pixel Union
alto.description: Alto is a content-focused theme that channels the best of digital publishing. Sharp lettering and simple organization provide an engrossing reader experience, all easily tuned to fit your content perfectly. A subtle mix of traditional and contemporary aesthetics, Alto is a perfect frame for blogs, portfolios, and magazines.
alto.description_long:
Alto is a content-focused theme: its sharp lettering and simple organization will provide an engrossing experience for your readers. Employing a subtle mix of traditional and contemporary aesthetics, Alto is a perfect frame for blogs, portfolios, and magazines.

Alto‘s design is especially attractive for sites aiming for the feel and flow of a digital magazine. You can keep your readers connected with links to more than 25 social media sites, and encourage a lively dialogue with the theme’s optional threaded comments.

Responsive Layout

Alto is fully responsive, so your content will look sharp on any device or browser.

Alternate Post Types

No one’s a fan of monotony. That’s why we’ve packed Alto with two alternative post types, giving you the freedom to present your content in three different ways.

Here’s the default post layout:

Compare it to the first alternative style, with the post’s metadata – categories, author, date, etc. – placed beneath the featured image:

In the second alternative post type, the featured image becomes a splashy, full-width statement:

More Ways to Customize Your Site

On top of a custom header image, Alto also lets you add sleek social media links in the right-hand side of the theme’s footer.

Need help setting up your theme? Head over to Alto’s support page.

Quick Specs (all measurements in pixels):

  1. The main column width is 660.
  2. The sidebar width is 272.
  3. Featured Images are 1200 wide by unlimited height on single posts (using Default Layout), 1000 wide by unlimited height on single posts (using Alternative Layout #1), and 1240 wide by unlimited height on single posts (using Alternative Layout #2).

atrium.name: Atrium
atrium.author: Pixel Union
atrium.description: Atrium is a single-channel theme that keeps content cleanly organized with sharp lines and modular sections. Bright and spacious, Atrium’s architectural layout is the perfect framework for any form of content. It’s designed for brands and bloggers and you.
atrium.description_long:
Atrium is a single-channel theme that keeps content cleanly organized with sharp lines and modular sections. Bright and spacious, Atrium’s architectural layout is the perfect framework for any form of content. It’s ideally designed for brands and bloggers.

Responsive Design

Atrium is fully responsive and scales to fit any screen size and browser. Its single-column layout and right-hand sidebar make for a robust, readable, and welcoming blog. On mobile devices, Atrium‘s sidebar moves to the bottom of your page so visitors will still have a spacious area to view your content, and the portfolio projects grid scales to best suit your screen size.

Brandable

Take advantage of Atrium‘s flexible theme options to best match your style or brand. To start, add a full-width Custom Header Image or Custom Header Video. Change your Background Color to match and perfect the tone.

Use a Standard or Compact Header, toggle your Header Text on or off completely, or upload a Site Logo, depending on your needs.

Add a Sticky Post to the top of your homepage, or create a Static Homepage if your project isn’t solely a blog.

Highlight all your social media accounts – right from the Header – with gorgeous icons for over 25 built-in services.

Atrium currently includes icons for Bandcamp, Behance, Del.ico.us, deviantART, Digg, Dribbble, email, Etsy, Facebook, Flickr, Foursquare, GitHub, Google+, Instagram, Last.fm, LinkedIn, MySpace, Pinboard, Pinterest, Rdio, Skype, Soundcloud, Spotify, StumbleUpon, Svpply, Twitter, Vimeo, and YouTube.

Full-Featured Sidebar

Each widget is modular and visually separated from the other parts of your page, just like your posts. They don’t interfere with one another, and they’re easy to read. You can also disable the sidebar all together to give your posts all the glory.

Full-Width Image, Video, and Gallery Posts

When it comes to permalinks, Atrium gives featured images, videos, and galleries a prominent position above your content — perfect for calling attention to your best work, and excellent for telling better stories.

Longform Posts

With a special style for long-form content, Atrium prioritizes your essays, case studies, journals, or big announcements.

Portfolios

Atrium‘s functionality doubles thanks to the new Portfolio post type. You can host any personal or professional portfolios right alongside your blog or website, or use Atrium solely as a portfolio, if that’s all you need.

Quick Specs (all measurements in pixels):

  1. The main column width is 640.
  2. The sidebar width is 339.
  3. Featured Images in the blog index are 600 wide by unlimited height and 960 by unlimited height as header images on single posts.

designer.name: Designer
designer.author: Array
designer.description: Promote your latest design work, sketches, audio, photography and more with Designer. Featuring an eclectic, responsive design and a fully-featured blog, you can get a professional portfolio up and running effortlessly, with zero coding required. Designer is easy to customize and ships with several portfolio styles including tiled, landscape, portrait and square.
designer.description_long:
Promote your latest design work, photography, artwork, and more with Designer. Featuring a minimal, responsive design, Designer gets your portfolio up and running effortlessly, zero coding required.

Create Your Portfolio


Designer is perfect for photographers, graphic designers, artists, videographers, and students. Using a mix of images, galleries and video, you can easily create an impressive portfolio showcasing your latest and greatest work.

Designer ships with several portfolio styles including tiled, landscape (4:3), portrait (3:4), and square (1:1). We’ve provided support for all media types so that you can create a portfolio layout that best highlights your work.

Minimal, Responsive Design

Designer was crafted for all screens, from desktop to mobile and every device in between. Images, text, galleries, and video scale down gracefully for a seamless mobile browsing experience.

Distraction-Free


Designer tucks away distractions so visitors and potential clients can focus on your content. Responsive site navigation, social links, and widgets are available via a slide-out sidebar, which can optionally be set to always show.

Detailed Typography

Designer’s typography has been carefully curated for bold, attention-grabbing headlines, and crisp, legible paragraph text. The attention to typography carries over to tablet and mobile devices to ensure your visitors are getting a beautiful experience no matter how they browse.

Customize Designer

Customize Designer to match your style! Choose from four sidebar color options including white, black, blue and gray. Designer also includes a minimal blog option, which complements Designer’s minimal style.

Social Links Menu

Designer makes it easy to add your social media links to the sidebar. Simply create a menu with your links and Designer will add the matching icon to your link. Available icons: Twitter, Facebook, Google, Instagram, YouTube, Vimeo, Dribbble, Github, Flickr, CodePen, Behance, Dropbox, Pinterest, Reddit, Soundcloud, Spotify, WordPress, and Email.

Read more about Adding Custom Links.

Quick Specs (all measurements in pixels):

  1. Suggested logo width is 300 wide.
  2. The main column width is 936.
  3. Featured Images on blog posts are 787 wide by unlimited height.
  4. Images on Portfolio Projects are 937 wide by unlimited height.
  5. Images on Portfolio grid are 405 wide by unlimited height.

picks.name: Staff Picks
picks.description: Determines which themes are shown in the "Choose a theme" step during signup.

magazine.name: Magazine
magazine.author: StudioPress
magazine.description: Magazine is a sleek and modern theme that allows you to spotlight your cutting-edge content.
magazine.description_long:
Got lots of magazine-style content and need a stylish frame? The Magazine a great choice for sites that have a lot to say. Choose from many content-friendly soft color schemes, and widgets that support everything from video to in-depth articles to great photography. Magazine is sleek, up-to-date, and always cutting-edge… just like your content.

The Magazine theme has multiple layouts and menus, breadcrumbs, and archive control. You can even add a customized Header image or custom background.

Theme Colors

The Magazine child theme includes the following features: 7 color styles – blue, green, lavender, orange, pink, red and teal.

Featured Images

The Magazine theme is a great fit if you publish magazine or news style content. You can showcase multiple categories on the homepage and use featured images to make your site look stunning.

Layouts

You can choose from 6 different layout configurations for Magazine. You can have your content on the left with a sidebar on the right, flip that around, have two sidebars or even remove the sidebar altogether.

Plenty of Options

Part of Magazine’s charm is the option for customizing the look of your site. This includes sidebar widget area, two menu areas, and control over what content is displayed in your blog archive pages.

Custom Header Image and Background

You can further customize Magazine thanks to the Custom Header and Background options found in Appearance → Header and Appearance → Background.

Quick Specs (all measurements in pixels):

  1. Content and One Sidebar: The main column width is 610 with one sidebar of 300.
  2. Full-width layout: The main column is 910

Magazine theme documentation

the-parisian.name: The Parisian
the-parisian.author: Automattic
the-parisian.description: A minimal theme for personal blogging with a generous image slider, featured header images, and more!
the-parisian.description_long:
The Parisian is a minimalist, one-column theme for personal or photo blogging. With a large image slider on the home page, a responsive layout for devices of any size, a widget area that can be toggled open or closed, and support for multiple post formats, it’s a perfect fit if you want an elegant, old-world look and feel for your site.

Recent Posts Image Slider

The Parisian includes a prominent image slider that displays Featured Images for up to ten recent posts on the site’s home page. Featured Images will be displayed in the slider as long as they are at least 1440px wide by 600px tall.

Post Formats

This theme supports Aside, Image, Video, Link, Quote, Audio, Gallery, and Status Post Formats. Formatted posts are designated by icons located next to the post title on the blog and single post views.

Custom Header and Featured Header Images

You can set a Custom Header under Appearance → Header. Your selected image will display full size on the home page as a single image, or as part of the recent posts image slider.

On single posts and pages, your custom header will be displayed as a narrow strip at the top, behind your site title and tagline. If a Featured Image is set for a post or page, it will display in place of your Custom Header as a Featured Header Image, like so:

Theme Options

By default, The Parisian displays the site owner’s Gravatar in the header area on the site’s front page. You can opt not to show the Gravatar by going to Customizer → Theme Options and selecting “No” from the “Display Gravatar on Home Page” drop-down menu.

Connect

You can add links to your Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, and Tumblr accounts to your site’s header on single pages or posts. First, connect these services to Publicize, by going to Settings → Sharing. Once connected, navigate to the Customizer, where you’ll find a new Connect panel. Select the account(s) you want to link to and their respective icons will display like so:

Widgets

The Parisian includes a toggle-able widget area in the footer; click the gear to reveal or hide the widgets.

Custom Menu

The Parisian has a single, primary custom menu area in the footer, that can be set up by going to Appearance → Menus. It will display one level of menu items.

Custom Backgrounds

The background color or image can be customized under Appearance → Background.

Quick Specs (all measurements in pixels)

  1. The main column width is 700.
  2. The custom header and featured images on the blog index are 1440 by 600.
  3. The featured image headers on single posts and pages are 1440 by 200.

magnate-express.name: Magnate Express
magnate-express.author: WooThemes
magnate-express.description: Magnate Express is a blogging / photography theme with an adaptive layout focused on your content and with a unique slider to showcase featured images from your posts. Another awesome theme by WooThemes.
magnate-express.description_long:
Magnate Express is a blogging / photography theme with an adaptive layout focused on your content and with a unique slider to showcase featured images from your posts. It’s the perfect theme for creative people to showcase their work – Think of it as an alternative to some of the popular hosted solutions for designers showcasing portfolios and selling prints.

About The Theme

Easy to customize

Magnate Express comes with the option to customize the header and the background that make it easy to fit to your site’s personality.

Responsive Design

Nowadays users are visiting sites from an increasing array of devices and browsers. Magnate Express was built with this in mind, adjusting the layout to accommodate screens of different sizes and orientation.

Slider

Clip content to the top of your homepage with an easy to use Content Slider. The Slider includes an option to select the speed of the animation and an option to select the animation itself – Fade or Slide.

Three Customizable Menus

Magnate Express also has three menu areas: a traditional page menu and a second (optional) top menu. You can take control of these three areas in Appearance → Menus by creating your own custom menus and assigning them to either menu location.

Support for Post Formats

Enhance your site with Post Formats by displaying various types of content. Magnate Express includes support for the Aside, Image, Video, Quote, Link and Chat Post Formats.

Quick Specs (all measurements in pixels):

  1. The main column width is 624.
  2. The sidebar width is 298.

business-identity.name: Business Identity
business-identity.author: Professional Themes
business-identity.description: Showcase your business, connect with your customers, and make a strong and professional impact on the web with Business Identity. Featuring custom logo and site layout functionality, a beautiful home page template, and customer testimonials, Business Identity is the right choice for your online brand.
business-identity.description_long:
Business Identity was made for businesses and entrepreneurs who need a beautiful and professional home on the web. It was built with a mobile-first, responsive approach to web design, which means that readers will be able to see your content no matter whether they use a mobile phone, tablet, or desktop computer when they visit. Business Identity caters to small and big businesses alike, featuring a site logo, brilliant front page template, customer testimonials, and featured content slider.

Brilliant Home Page

Without a doubt, our favorite part of Business Identity — and the thing we hope you’ll love most — is its home page template. We’ve built it to be fully responsive and beautiful on all of your devices, and made sure to address a lot of your business needs when crafting a home page for your website.

Custom Website Layout Options

Business Identity comes in two layout flavors: wide (default) and slim. Choose the layout that works best for your business.

You also have the option to display your primary sidebar on the right (default) or left side of your site.

Custom Site Logo

Business Identity allows you to upload your company’s custom logo. Use it, along with a Blavatar, to add additional branding into your site.

Featured Image Support

Business Identity supports featured images on both posts and pages, as well as on customer testimonial pages and on the home page template.

Customer Testimonials

Testimonials are a great way to show community support and customer appreciation for your business or product. Business Identity supports customer testimonials, which are very easy to set up.

Three Custom Widget Areas

Business Identity supports up to three widget areas: Primary Sidebar, Website Footer, and Front Page.

Two Custom Navigation Menus

Two custom site navigation menus are supported by Business Identity, a Primary Menu in the site header, and Secondary Menu in the footer.

Documentation and Support

You’ll find all the documentation you’ll need to get started with Business Identity on our theme demo site, as well as the supplemental support page.

We’re dedicated to making sure that your experience building a site with Business Identity is a great one. Feel free to reach out to us for any reason in the WordPress.com support forum or, if you have questions you’d like to get answered before you buy the theme, contact us through the demo site.

Quick Specs (all measurements in pixels)

  1. Read the detailed guide on setting up your home page.
  2. The main content column width is 770 except in the full-width layout where it’s 1170.
  3. The maximum width of widget areas is as follows: Primary Sidebar (350); Front Page (254); Footer (264). Read more on the widgets documentation page.
  4. Featured images are supported on both posts and pages. Read all about them on their documentation page.
  5. The maximum size allowed for the custom site logo is 48 by 48. You can upload a larger image for better visual clarity, but it will be constrained to this size.
  6. There’s an option in the theme for wide and slim view. By default the view is set to wide
  7. There’s an option in the theme for right and left Primary Sidebar layout. By default the Primary Sidebar is on the right side of the theme.

If you have pre-sale questions about Business Identity, please feel free to contact us!

Special Thanks

Big thanks to Christopher Rowe, who assisted with the initial UI design concepts for Business Identity.

picks.name: Staff Picks
picks.description: Determines which themes are shown in the "Choose a theme" step during signup.

bailey.name: Bailey
bailey.author: The Theme Foundry
bailey.description: A minimal portfolio theme with designer grid layouts and easy-to-configure projects. Crafted with a responsive layout that looks great on large displays, tablets and mobile devices.
bailey.description_long:
Make It Your Own

With Bailey, we’ve leveraged the built-in Customizer, so it’s easier than ever to make your website your own. Easily add a custom logo, social icons, and more.

Start Sharing Now: Your Best Work Front and Center

Bailey’s custom-built portfolio makes it easy to share anything—from your photos, artwork, galleries, slideshows, or videos, to full case studies of client projects. Select from one- to three-column grids, and choose from three hover effects. Individual projects can be grouped and sorted automatically by type and tag.

Designer Details: Typekit Out of the Box

A well-structured grid and asymmetrical layout brings your work into focus. Building upon this clean, minimalist and designer look is a creative and sophisticated pairing of Franklin Gothic URW for the main copy and Kepler Std for splashes of accent. You can also easily add your own custom Typekit fonts if you choose. Both premium fonts are included out of the box. There’s no need for a separate Typekit account.

Please note: Bailey comes with one year of WordPress.com’s Custom Design upgrade included in the cost. The Custom Design upgrade gives you access to the special Typekit fonts, as well as color options and the ability to modify the theme’s CSS. While Bailey itself is a one-time purchase, the Custom Design upgrade is a yearly upgrade that must be renewed separately after the first year. Its cost is $30.00 per year. If you choose not to renew the Custom Design upgrade after the first year, the theme will no longer be displayed with Typekit fonts.

Further Help

If you need help with Bailey be sure to read through the full support documentation. You can also ask us questions in the WordPress.com Bailey support forum.

Quick Specs (all measurements in pixels):

  • Featured images should have a minimum width of 1042.
  • The main column maximum width is 1042.
  • All images and video will scale to fit the viewing screen.

picks.name: Staff Picks
picks.description: Determines which themes are shown in the "Choose a theme" step during signup.

traction.name: Traction
traction.author: The Theme Foundry
traction.description: A super clean magazine theme featuring built-in post thumbnail support, a featured post slider, and a robust theme options menu.
traction.description_long:
By The Theme Foundry

Traction is a super-clean magazine theme featuring an easy-to-use featured post slider, built-in post thumbnail support, three available color schemes, support for a custom logo, handcrafted subscribe icons, and three custom page templates.

Elegant and professional, it is perfect for a news, business, tech, or magazine site—with its dark, modern look it is also well-suited for a personal journal or blog.

Featured Post Slider

Showcase top posts on your front page by enabling the featured post slider in Appearance → Themes. Options for the slider display include autostart, start delay, slide animation speed, and fade speed.

To add a post to the slider, simply mark it as “Sticky” in the post’s “Visibility” settings. Add interest to your featured posts by uploading an image as Featured Image to the post. The image will be displayed in two sizes: a small version (30 pixels by 30 pixels) in the featured slider’s navigation sidebar and a larger version (602 pixels by 200 pixels) in the post currently displayed in the slider’s main area.

Post Thumbnails

Traction makes great use of the WordPress post thumbnails, meaning the image you add to a post or page as its “Featured Image.” (Learn more about featured images.)

Three sizes of post thumbnails are used in the theme: a medium-sized version (175 pixels by 150 pixels) will be displayed at the top of your posts in index, archive, search, and single pages. The other two sizes are used with the featured post slider: small (30 pixels by 30 pixels) and large (602 pixels by 200 pixels).

Theme Options: Logo, Color Scheme, and Subscribe Links

Traction’s Theme Options menu gives you the flexibility to make all kind of design changes to your theme. With the click of a button you can easily customize your colors, add your logo, and more. To set up the options, head over to Appearance → Theme Options.

Easily add your own custom logo to the header using the built-in uploader, and hide or show your site tagline. Enable the “Subscribe” links for RSS, subscribe by email, Flickr, Twitter, and Facebook, and Traction will display the links with nifty handcrafted follow icons in your site header. Choose from three unique color schemes: blue (default), red, or green.



Custom Page Templates

Traction includes three different page templates to further customize your site. The sitemap page template allows your visitors to quickly find all your site content at one glance, the archives page template is great for organizing all of your content by date or category, and the full-width page template allows you more space by hiding the sidebar.

Help and additional information

If you need help with Traction be sure to read through the documentation by clicking the Support button at the top of the sidebar on this page. You can also ask us questions in the WordPress.com Traction support forum.

Looking to buy Traction for a self hosted WordPress.org website? The Theme Foundry builds WordPress templates for WordPress.org and you can purchase the Traction theme for WordPress.org directly from their website.

Quick Specs (all measurements in pixels):

  1. The main column width is 618 except in the full-width layout where it’s 920.
  2. Featured images sizes are 602 by 200 for large image in featured slider, 175 by 150 for normal post thumbnail, and 30 by 30 for small navigational thumbnail in featured slider.

basis.name: Basis
basis.author: The Theme Foundry
basis.description: A professional business theme with flexible drag and drop layouts and stunning slideshows.
basis.description_long:
by The Theme Foundry

Start building.

Drag and drop layouts.

Basis features a drag and drop page builder interface. Create a section, add your content, and move it around. Mix and match sections in countless combinations. Each section fits together perfectly, so building a layout is easy. Go assemble the perfect page.

Stunning slideshows.

Introduce yourself.

We didn’t stop with the new page builder interface. Basis also makes it easy to create beautiful full-width slideshows, which are perfect for introducing you or your brand on your homepage, a promotional page, or a tour of your products and services. You don’t need to deal with tagging posts or finding pages either. You’ll create and sort all your slides quickly and easily from one page.

Go big.

Create a landing page.

Any pages created with the product builder or the slideshow builder can be turned into a landing page or microsite. Turn on “minimal mode" for that page and the header will disappear. Great for showcasing your product or event, making a special announcement, or building a simple one page website. Basis is one the most flexible WordPress business themes on the market.

Add some style.

Make it your own.

Personalizing your new website should be fun. We’ve leveraged the built-in WordPress customizer, so adding your own background image or color is easy. On top of that, we’ve included options for customizing the link colors and adding a custom logo (custom colors other than the background require the Custom Design upgrade). Combine these options with the page builder to give your website a truly unique look.

Help and additional information

If you need help with Basis be sure to read through the Basis documentation by clicking the Support button at the top of the sidebar on this page. You can also ask us questions in the WordPress.com Basis support forum.

Please note: the Product Builder and special templates mentioned above are intended for styled text, and do not fully support WordPress.com Business eCommerce plugins.

Looking to buy Basis for a self hosted WordPress.org website? The Theme Foundry builds WordPress templates for WordPress.org and you can purchase the Basis theme for WordPress.org directly from their website.

Quick Specs (all measurements in pixels):

  1. Basis is a flexible-width, responsive design.
  2. Images and videos will scale to fit the viewing screen.
  3. Archive and single post pages feature a main column width of 610px.
  4. Product page template display content at a width of 1068px.

blocco.name: Blocco
blocco.author: Press75
blocco.description: A very unique block style theme including a responsive design.
blocco.description_long:
Blocco is Italian for “block” which seemed like a suitable name for this unique block-style theme. The home and category pages display your posts in “blocks” which makes it really easy to navigate and interesting to look at. Blocco was designed specifically with blogging in mind, but works perfectly for photos and video as well.

Beautiful Photos and Video

Photo posts in Blocco utilize the Featured Image functionality in WordPress to showcase an individual photograph within each “block” and at the top of each single post. Video posts do the same by showcasing your video perfectly at the to of each single video post.

Perfectly Responsive

The Blocco theme includes a responsive design which means that your viewing experience will always be perfect no matter what your screen size is (e.g. iPhone, iPad, Laptop, Desktop). This is also where the block-style layout shines through. If you would prefer not use the mobile optimizations, you can easily disable them within your WordPress admin.

Customization Options

The Blocco theme includes compatibility with the WordPress theme customizer. You can customize your theme background image and/or color, upload a custom logo and/or change the logo font color. You can change how your menus are displayed and positioned as well as add or remove custom menu items (links, posts, pages). Finally, you can customize how your posts and pages are displayed and formatted.

Quick Specs (all measurements in pixels):

  1. Full width content is 660.
  2. Content with one sidebar is 420
  3. Block is 219

creative.name: Creative
creative.author: UpThemes
creative.description: Show off your design skills and style with Creative by UpThemes. Creative lets you express yourself through crisp typography, social media presence, and much more with a self-hiding navigation system that tucks itself away while the user reads and shows up just when you expect it to.
creative.description_long:
by UpThemes


Creative is a portfolio theme for designers, photographers, and other creative individuals to showcase work beautifully. Designed to work across all devices and screen sizes, Creative offers unique portfolio features and supports popular features like infinite scroll, featured content, and more.

Showcase your Portfolio

Creative makes it easy to share your work with prospective clients, friends, and family. With a customizable grid of projects and a flexible single-project view, adding your work is easy and gives you a professional look. Learn how to set up your portfolio and use the portfolio shortcode.

Easy Project Categorization and Tagging

With project tags and project types, visitors can filter your work and dive into specific sections of your portfolio quickly and easily.

Featured Content

Showcase your best work on the front page of your site by tagging content as “featured.” Featured items will be shown at the top of the page in a slider. You can even customize the speed and transition to fit your style.

Add a Site Logo

Creative lets you upload a Site Logo – and allows you to keep your logo when you switch to another theme that supports the Site Logo feature. No need to upload a new image for the header, simply upload your logo once and take it with you no matter what.

 

Here’s the Site Logo in action:

Share Case Studies on your Blog

Blog posts with the Creative theme are simply stunning, with incredible typography and a beautiful three-column layout that puts the focus on your content.

Quick Specs (all measurements in pixels)

  1. The main column width is 670.
  2. Featured images work best with images that are at least 1280x500.
  3. Custom header image is best at 1170x85.
  4. The primary sidebar (right) width is 290.
  5. Widgets in the footer widget area are 300 wide.
  6. The header image size is at least 200 tall, the width can vary and the image will scale to fit inside the header.
  7. Portfolio images should be at least 800 wide and a 5:4 ratio is recommended.

ampersand.name: Ampersand
ampersand.author: Array
ampersand.description: Ampersand is a portfolio style theme with an empasis on beautiful, legible typography and graceful resizing for mobile browsing.
ampersand.description_long:
Ampersand is clean and professional portfolio theme for creatives. Featuring a minimal, responsive layout, Ampersand looks just as good on your mobile device as it does your desktop.

Ampersand powers websites for photographers, teachers, creative directors, startups, bloggers and everyone in between. Simple to setup, simple to use.

Viewport Friendly

Ampersand is responsive, from desktop to mobile and everything in between. Because of the percentage-based layout, the design will adapt to any screen without sacrificing usability or design integrity. All aspects of Ampersand have been optimized for web and mobile visitors.

Publish Your Portfolio

You can easily use Ampersand as a dedicated portfolio for your images, galleries and videos. Utilizing the unique homepage and portfolio templates, you can create an impressive collection of mixed media to show off your skills.

View the Portfolio

Typography Guide

Ampersand ships with Roboto, a geometric sans-serif font that features friendly, open curves. This makes for a more natural reading rhythm. Everything from titles to paragraph text has been optimized for a comfortable reading experience.

View the Style Guide

Unique Custom Headers

Ampersand will (optionally) utilize your Featured Image to display it as a transparent, full-width image as the background of your header. This gives each page a unique depth and texture. View this effect on a few of the Portfolio items.

Quick Specs (all measurements in pixels)

  1. The main column width is 770 except in the full-width layout where it’s 1050.

funki.name: Funki
funki.author: Automattic
funki.description: Funki is a funky theme with some artsy flare. It has a responsive structure and offers multiple layouts, either one, two, or three columns, based on the widget areas you choose to show. It also comes with many background choices, with different motifs and patterns, and a primary color chooser. It has a featured section for sticky posts, supports custom menus, featured images, custom header, background image, and optional footer widget areas. Funk up your site with Funki now!
funki.description_long:
Funki is a very versatile premium theme, offering many customizations and flexibility. It’s a funky theme with artsy flare. It has a responsive structure and offers multiple layouts. It also comes with many background choices, including different motifs and patterns, and a primary color chooser. It has a featured section for sticky posts, supports custom menus, featured images, background image, and optional footer widget areas. Funk up your site with Funki!

Widgets and Layouts

The theme offers four different and responsive layouts. From one column to three columns, all based on where you drag your widgets so you don’t have to set any special options, it just works. On top of that, all layouts are flexible so they adapt to smaller screens.

The two primary sidebars are labeled Right and Left, respectively. To change the layout put your widgets on the sidebar you wish to show. If no widgets are found, you will get a one column layout.

Backgrounds

Funki comes with different background patterns and motifs to chose from. You can also upload your own background image, or choose a solid color. If you want to change the background color but keep the patterns you can change the “Primary Color” on Appearance → Theme Options.

Featured Posts

The theme also has a dynamic featured post area (aka Post Slider) which is easy to set up: add big featured images—at least 990 in width and 420 in height—to your sticky posts and you’ll see the images show up in the top featured area.

Other Features

Funki provides you with three optional footer widget areas. You can also set a primary color which is used for links and other visual elements. It comes with two areas for Custom Menus, one below the site title, the other on the footer.

Quick Specs (all measurements in pixels):

  1. On Left or Right sidebar layouts: The main content is 620 and the sidebar is 312.
  2. Single-column layout: the main content is 620.
  3. Three column layout, the main content is 573 and sidebars 158.
  4. Full-width and attachment pages: The main content is 990.

the-writer.name: The Writer
the-writer.author: Obox Themes
the-writer.description: A minimal writing theme, built for writers, authors and columnists. Nothing else. Simple.
the-writer.description_long:
A minimal writing theme, built for aspiring writers, authors and columnists – nothing else. We have made sure that your long form articles are packaged in an easy to read layout which is customizable and mobile friendly.

Create Beautiful Story Covers

Upload a background image to create a beautiful collection of articles to show off on your home page.

It’s Mobile Friendly

Your site will look amazing on all devices

By using a mobile-friendly theme you know that any visitor to your website will be having the best experience no matter what device it is they’re using.

  • Mobile-friendly on any modern phone or tablet.
  • Looks great to all of your site visitors.
  • No need for extra mobile-plugins.
  • Works from the moment you activate your theme.

Customization Support

  • Upload a custom logo via the WordPress Header image feature, as well as a custom background to really match your blog’s mood.
  • Extensions to the WordPress customizer allow you to toggle excerpts and additional post information on and off without touching a line of code.

Check out The Writers’s demo site!

Quick Specs (measurements in pixels)

  1. Post content is 760 wide
  2. Sidebar is 280
  3. Videos in video posts are 760 wide
  4. Custom header height is 45 high

just-desserts.name: Just Desserts
just-desserts.author: Automattic
just-desserts.description: Just Desserts is a clean and stylish food-blogging theme designed by Andy Rutledge. Its single-column layout and unique presentation of images and posts on the front page give you a delectable canvas on which your mouthwatering content — from text to photographs — can really shine.
just-desserts.description_long:
Just Desserts is a clean and stylish theme for food bloggers. Its single-column layout and unique presentation of images and posts on the front page give you a delectable canvas on which your mouthwatering content — from text to photographs — can really shine.

Theme Options

Just Desserts comes loaded with fun options that help you personalize your blog. Head on over to Appearance > Theme Options in your Dashboard to set any of the options described below.

Social Links
Just Desserts provides nifty icons for your blog’s RSS feed as well as for your Facebook, Twitter, and Pintrest profiles. These icons appear in a supplementary widget area just above the footer.

Colors
Have fun selecting the perfect accent color and link color for your blog! Either use one of the six designer-suggested accent and link color combinations, or use the color pickers to select your own combinations. The flavor possibilities are endless.

Headline Font
Choose between 2 great fonts for your post titles and other headers: Josefin Slab and Bree Serif. These two fonts are not available through our Custom Design upgrade. If you have the Custom Design upgrade, we suggest Museo Slab as another great alternative headline font.

Front Page

On the front page, Just Desserts loves to highlight your images. If you add a large featured image to a post (at least 920 pixels wide), the featured image will appear above your post content. If you create a post that has no featured images but does have at least three image attachments that are each at least 280 pixels wide, those three images will display in a mini gallery above the post on the front page.

Also, Just Desserts displays post excerpts on the front page. If you create a post that only contains images or video (and no text), be sure to type a short excerpt inside the excerpt module for that post so that it won’t appear empty on the front page.

Image and Gallery Post Formats

Just Desserts supports three post formats — standard, image, and gallery. Posts with the standard format display your categories, tags, comment number and the post date in a unique, nifty gray inline box which is aligned to the right of your post content (or to the left, if your language reads from right to left).

If the inline post information box is not your thing, or if you like to create posts that contain lots of large images or galleries, it’s highly recommended that you use the image or gallery post formats, respectively. Image and gallery posts display the post information at the bottom of the post, freeing up the main content area to display your images at full width.

Image Post Format Example
Standard Post with Large Post Information Box

Sidebars and Custom Menus

Just Desserts supports four widget areas: three in the footer and one in a supplementary area above the footer, aligned to the left of the social icons.

Widget area names and social icon links in Just Desserts.

In addition to widget areas, Just Desserts ships with two custom menu areas: one main menu, and the other in the footer.

Responsive Layout

Special care has been taken to ensure that Just Desserts adapts its layout gracefully to fit smaller devices. Your readers can enjoy all that you have to offer, even if they’re visiting your site on a tablet or a smartphone.

Custom Header and Custom Background

Of course, Just Desserts supports the WordPress features you know and love! Upload a header image and set a background color or image of your choice to put a final personal touch on your creation.

Quick Specs (all measurements in pixels)

  1. The main column width is 920 with a responsive layout.
  2. Footer sidebars: width is 920 when one sidebar is active, 433 when two sidebars are active, and 284 when all three sidebars are active.
  3. Supplementary sidebar: width is 920 when no social links are present, and 580 when social links are present.

Just Desserts theme documentation

axon.name: Axon
axon.author: DesignOrbital
axon.description: Axon is a clean, creative and responsive WordPress blog theme. It has an eye-catching featured posts content area. Axon is powered with boxed or wide layout that can be further customized to left sidebar, right sidebar or without sidebar easily. Other features are custom header, post formats, social links, and footer widgets.
axon.description_long:
Axon is a clean, creative and responsive WordPress blog theme. It has an eye-catching featured posts content area. Axon is powered with boxed or wide layout that can be further customized to left sidebar, right sidebar or without sidebar easily.

Fully Responsive Design

Responsive layout of Axon WordPress theme adapts to the screen size of different devices your visitors are using. Your site will always look good and utilize 100% of screen estate on every device.

Featured Posts

Axon has an eye-catching featured posts content area at home page. You can easily grab the attention of your visitors to the desired posts. Any post or page can be made featured with the help of the featured tag via the Customizer.

Featured Images

Featured Images are displayed above the post content on the blog index and on single pages.

Post Formats & Sticky Posts

Axon supports Post Formats and Sticky Posts. Aside, audio, gallery, image, link, quote and video post formats give your website a beautiful look.

Content & Sidebar Layouts

Axon is powered with very flexible layout options. You can choose the following layouts easily.

  • Content/Sidebar Layout
  • Sidebar/Content Layout
  • Content Layout Only

Wide & Boxed Layout

You can use Axon in default wide layout or personalize it with beautiful backgrounds by using the boxed layout.

Full Width Template

Axon comes with a full-width page template to put the focus on your content.

Custom Header & Background

You can personalize your site with a custom header and background via the Customizer.

Custom Menus

Axon allows you to have a custom menu in the theme’s header. It can be set up by going to Appearance → Menus.

Widget Areas

Axon comes with five widget areas – one in the right or left sidebar, and up to four in the footer. The footer widget areas will activate once you drag widgets to them in Appearance → Widgets.

Connect to Social Networks

Axon allows you to add links to your Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Google Plus and Tumblr accounts in the theme’s footer. First, connect these services to Publicize, by going to Settings → Sharing. Once connected, navigate to the Customizer, where you will find a new Connect panel. Select the account(s) you want to link to, and their respective icons will be displayed.

Quick Specs (all measurements in pixels):

  1. The main column width is 748 except in the full-width and content layout, where it’s 1040.

promenade.name: Promenade
promenade.author: Cedaro
promenade.description: Featuring a widgetized home page, Promenade’s clean layout and minimalistic design is perfect to capture your audience’s attention and allow them to easily navigate your content.
promenade.description_long:
You’re a musician, a singer, an artist, a producer, a maker of music, and you want to share your creativity and experiences with the world. Promenade was made for you.

Flexible Homepage

Highlight your most relevant content on the homepage using the “featured” tag. Promenade allows up to four featured posts.

As an alternative, add a cover photo to the homepage using Featured Images to personalize your site. Cover photos aren’t just for the homepage either — add one to any page to increase its prominence.

Take your homepage a step further and spotlight your music with a custom audio player and playlist. Images, galleries, videos, and more can also be added to the homepage’s content area.

Showcase Your Media

Use Promenade’s Video Archive and Record Archive templates to create easy-to-navigate media libraries.

Single record pages display your music in a clean, playable tracklist that your fans will enjoy using.

Single video pages display your media in a full-width template that gives your videos the prominence they deserve.

Responsive

Promenade is fully responsive, allowing fans access to your site on any device, from mobile to desktop.

Make It Your Own

Differentiate your site even more using the Customizer to change the background color, upload a custom logo, add footer widgets, and link to your social media profiles.

A focus on legible typography and a clean layout ensures that your content will stand out with beauty, grace, and class.

Quick Specs (all width measurements in pixels)

  1. The featured header image has a max width of 1600
  2. The main content width for full width pages is 1100
  3. The main content width is 720.
  4. The main sidebar width is 340.
  5. The record archive thumbnail size is 1:1 aspect ratio.
  6. The video archive thumbnail size is 16:9 aspect ratio.

mina-olen.name: Mina Olen
mina-olen.author: Foxnet
mina-olen.description: Mina olen is made for cool business type of sites. You can showcase your most important pages, latest posts, random portfolios and testimonials on front page template. You can also upload your logo, set global layout and enter footer text in theme customizer. And in the same time blogging features looks great too.
mina-olen.description_long:
Mina Olen is made for both business and portfolio types of sites, allowing you to showcase your most important content on its unique front page template. You can also upload your logo, set global or boxed layouts, and add footer text, all through the Customizer. Of course, all blogging features (like post formats) look great too.

With its responsive layouts, Mina Olen looks just as good on your mobile devices as it does on your desktop (and everything in between).

Theme also cares a lot about accessibility so that your site works on keyboard and screen readers. Web for everyone!

Custom Page Templates

Mina Olen has two Custom Page Templates that are great for business and corporate websites.

Front Page Template

With this template you can showcase your most important pages, latest posts, portfolio items, and testimonials. All of these can be set in the Customizer.

Full Width Page Template

As the name says you can disable sidebar with this template and give you content more room.

Portfolios and testimonials support

The theme has support for portfolios and testimonials, letting your work shine.

Theme customization

You can set front page settings, set a global or boxed layout, upload your logo, and enter your footer text, all in the Customizer.

Layouts

  • 1 Column
  • 2 Columns: Content / Sidebar
  • 2 Columns: Sidebar / Content (default)
  • Use a boxed layout on all pages

Social sharing and custom menus

Your social links can be set in the same way you set up any menu; the resulting social menu links are displayed as icons. There are also two custom menus included in the theme: a primary menu at the top of the page, and a subsidiary menu at the bottom of the page.
Note: The primary menu only supports top-level links and one level of sub items. The subsidiary menu only supports top-level links.

Header image

Mina Olen supports Custom Header Images. Their suggested size is 1920 x 379 pixels.

Note! If you set Feature Image at least 1920 x 379 pixels that replaces the original Header Image.

Demo and documentation

Check out the demo and documentation for more details.

Quick Specs (all measurements in pixels):

  1. Featured Images are 1920 width and 379 height.

wire.name: Wire
wire.author: Automattic
wire.description: A customizable, responsive, personal blog theme for the creative in you
wire.description_long:
Wire is a fully responsive theme with a fresh, bold design. It makes a striking choice for your personal or business blog.

Post Formats

Wire supports all post formats – Aside, Audio, Chat, Gallery, Image, Quote, Status, and Video. Each format has a slightly different design, giving your blog a touch of visual interest. Your readers will never know what you’ll post next.

Custom Header

Make your theme unique by uploading your own custom header. Wire works best with custom header images that are 1440 pixels wide and at least 610 pixels high.

If you check off “Show header text with your image” your header graphic will be displayed at its full size with your site title and tagline overlaid. If you uncheck it, a narrower portion of the header will appear instead. If you prefer the full-height version of the header displayed without your site title and tagline, head to Customize → Theme Options and check the box next to “Hide site title/tagline and display large header image.”

Connect

If you take a look at Wire’s demo site, you’ll see icons in the top right of the main menu, linking to profiles on Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn. To set this up for your own site, visit the Customizer and click on “Theme Options”. Enter the links in the boxes provided, and click “Save”.

Quick Specs (all measurements in pixels)

  1. The main column width is 920

creative-portfolio.name: Creative Portfolio
creative-portfolio.author: Professional Themes
creative-portfolio.description: Show off your professional portfolio and make an immediate and incredible impact with a featured content home page slider, featured home page video, client testimonials, and brilliant calls to action. Flexible, robust, and simple to use, Creative Portfolio is the right choice for showcasing your creativity.
creative-portfolio.description_long:
Show off your professional portfolio and make an immediate and incredible impact with a featured content home page slider, featured home page video, client testimonials, and brilliant calls to action. Flexible, robust, and simple to use, the Creative Portfolio theme is the right choice for showcasing your creativity.

Brilliant Home Page

Without a doubt, our favorite part of Creative Portfolio — and the thing we hope you’ll love most — is its front page template and super-versatile featured content slider. We’ve built both to be fully responsive and beautiful on all of your devices and made sure to address a lot of your business needs when crafting a home page for your website.

Page Templates To Suit All Needs

You’ll find many page templates available to you in Creative Portfolio. Here are some of the most useful templates you’ll find in the theme:

  • Alternate Sidebar Page
  • Child Page Grid
  • Featured Content
  • Full-width, no sidebar

Custom Website Layout Options

Jump into the Customizer and take advantage of the many site layout options that are available to you in Creative Portfolio, like site width, sidebar position, page breadcrumbs, blog content, and blog layout:

Custom Navigation Menus

Two custom site navigation menus are included in Creative Portfolio: a Primary Menu in the site header and a Secondary Menu in the footer.

Custom Site Logo

Creative Portfolio allows you to upload your company’s logo. Use it, along with a Blavatar, to add additional branding into your site.

Custom Widgets

Two custom widget areas are supported in the theme:

Documentation and Support
